      float simplex2D(int steps, float multiply, float x, float y)
      Deprecated. 
      Calculates a random 2D Perlin-Noise Value between -1 and +1,
      based on the interpolated value of random fractional corner values that are added on different scales.

      Also, don't ask why all the variables are made final.

        x - The X Position of the Noise Value.

      • interpolatedNoise

        public float interpolatedNoise(float x,
                      float y)
        Deprecated. 
        Calculates a random 2D Perlin-Noise Value between -1 and +1,
        based on the interpolated value of random fractional corner values.

        Also, don't ask why all the variables are made final.
        Parameters:
        x - The X Position of the Noise
        y - The Y Position of the Noise
        Returns:
        A random 2D Perlin-Noise Value between -1 and +1 as float.

      • cosineInterpolatedNoise

        public final float cosineInterpolatedNoise(float x,
                            float y)
        Deprecated. 
        Calculates a random 2D Perlin-Noise Value between -1 and +1,
        based on the cosine-interpolated value of random fractional corner values.

        Also, don't ask why all the variables are made final.
        Parameters:
        x - The X Position of the Noise
        y - The Y Position of the Noise
        Returns:
        A random 2D Perlin-Noise Value between -1 and +1 as float.

      • simplex2D

        public final float simplex2D(int steps,
              float multiply,
              float x,
              float y)
        Deprecated. 
        Calculates a random 2D Perlin-Noise Value between -1 and +1,
        based on the interpolated value of random fractional corner values that are added on different scales.

        Also, don't ask why all the variables are made final.
        Parameters:
        x - The X Position of the Noise
        y - The Y Position of the Noise
        steps - The amount of steps the simplex function should multiply together.
        multiply - The value that the simplex function should use to calculate the steps together.
        Returns:
        A random 2D Perlin-Noise Value between -1 and +1 as float.

      • noisy

        public final float noisy(float x,
          float z,
          boolean addOnly)
        Deprecated. Do not use if possible. Use the method "simplex" instead!
